short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow easy manual testing with the Mustard Results server

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mustard is a Ruby on Rails based multi-environment test results server. Mustard collects test results from closely related tests (IE Cross Browser or Mobile Testing on Multiple Device) and groups them for easy analysis. This extension allows for easy manual testing from inside the browser by displaying test steps and allowing users to write results including screenshots. To learn more about Mustard checkout https://github.com/Orasi/Mustard-Seed
